name: The Lookout (Aphushiro, Jaywis, StardustAvalanche)
description:
Game is has only been tested on a standard "qwerty keyboard layout".

Results on different keyboard layouts may vary.

Controls:

Mouse movement (up/down)      - Move between typing and using the spyglass

A-Z + Space bar                                    - Type on the jumbled keyboard

Backspace                                               - Discard message

Enter                                                          - Send completed message
